医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
通过模仿医生教育彻底改变人工智能培训当人类放射科医生检查扫描结果时，他们会透过数十年训练的镜头来观察。从大学到医学院再到住院医师实习，最终医生解释（例如，X光）的道路包括数千小时的学术和实践教育，从学习执照考试到作为住院医师多年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Revolutionizing-AI-training-by-emulated-physical-education.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Revolutionizing-AI-training-by-emulated-physical-education.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a6762f3-5e5f-456f-bdc0-0685c6fabd9b Tue, 15 Oct 2024 22:49:07 -0400 Revolutionizing AI training by emulating physician education
酵母的发现为癌症生存提供了新见解用于酿造啤酒的酵母能够在饥饿中存活的一种令人惊讶的方式的发现，可能为癌症的新疗法打开大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Yeast-discovery-offers-new-insights-into-cancer-survival.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Yeast-discovery-offers-new-insights-into-cancer-survival.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2592ec1-f3f3-471f-a9b1-c931f095d53a Tue, 15 Oct 2024 22:40:42 -0400 Yeast discovery offers new insights into cancer survival
新研究揭示狼疮炎症机制根据威尔康奈尔医学研究人员的一项新研究，在系统性红斑狼疮（通常称为狼疮）患者中，称为单核细胞的免疫细胞通过非常规途径产生一种称为白细胞介素-1β（IL-1β）的关键炎症蛋白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/New-study-reveals-mechanism-of-inflammation-in-lupus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/New-study-reveals-mechanism-of-inflammation-in-lupus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9625be73-960e-4ddc-b504-cfeb166c5e4d Tue, 15 Oct 2024 22:29:23 -0400 New study reveals mechanism of inflammation in lupus
世界卫生组织报告黎巴嫩医疗保健遭受令人震惊的袭击自2024年9月17日以色列和黎巴嫩之间的敌对行动升级以来，世卫组织已核实黎巴嫩境内发生了23起针对医疗机构的袭击事件，导致卫生工作者和患者72人死亡、43人受伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/WHO-reports-alarming-attacks-on-health-care-in-Lebanon.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/WHO-reports-alarming-attacks-on-health-care-in-Lebanon.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71aef176-acc2-477c-ab5a-98255aea6096 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 22:25:35 -0400 WHO reports alarming attacks on health care in Lebanon
研究显示，COVID-19 会增加儿童患 2 型糖尿病的风险研究人员发现，与患有其他呼吸道感染的儿童相比，感染 COVID-19 的儿童在六个月内患 2 型糖尿病的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/COVID-19-raises-the-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-in-children-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/COVID-19-raises-the-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-in-children-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6763801c-0763-4e63-9766-e44422871d7f Tue, 15 Oct 2024 22:25:00 -0400 COVID-19 raises the risk of type 2 diabetes in children, study reveals
对病毒感染相关疼痛机制的新见解《大脑、行为和免疫》杂志上发表的一篇文章报道了巴西、美国和韩国研究人员的一项研究结果，他们旨在了解病毒感染如何引起疼痛，并为寻找治疗疼痛的新方法做出贡献。缓解它。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/New-insights-into-pain-mechanisms-lated-to-viral-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/New-insights-into-pain-mechanisms-lated-to-viral-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4cf609cd-8e73-402d-bff8-d016ffa59125 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 22:22:39 -0400 New insights into pain mechanisms related to viral infections
遗传学被认为是痛风发生的关键因素一项重大国际研究发现痛风是一种慢性疾病，其主要原因是遗传因素，而不是患者的生活方式选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Genetics-identified-as-key-factor-in-gout-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Genetics-identified-as-key-factor-in-gout-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4d0e451-67fd-4ea7-b786-e81e68eb497c Tue, 15 Oct 2024 22:18:40 -0400 Genetics identified as key factor in gout development
空气污染增加急诊科就诊次数根据今天（周三）欧洲急诊医学大会上发表的研究，即使在世界卫生组织的指导方针范围内，空气中颗粒物水平的增加也与前往医院急诊科的患者人数的增加相对应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Air-pollution-increases-emergency-department-visits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Air-pollution-increases-emergency-department-visits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=153927ef-54b8-4858-8700-d71b7aeacd03 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 22:15:15 -0400 Air pollution increases emergency department visits
社会隔离与老年人微量营养素缺乏有关伦敦大学学院（UCL）研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，英国与社会隔绝的老年人更有可能摄入维生素 C 和维生素 B6 等关键微量营养素不足，从而增加了他们出现健康问题的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Social-isolation-linked-to-micronutrition-deficiency-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Social-isolation-linked-to-micronutrition-deficiency-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bea33dae-5e9b-45ba-85af-7c56bd99bfa7 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 21:56:50 -0400 Social isolation linked to micronutrient deficiencies in older adults
研究：对癌症复发的恐惧在儿童癌症的成年幸存者中很常见康科迪亚大学研究人员的一项新研究表明，三分之一的儿童癌症成年幸存者对癌症复发感到非常恐惧，这种恐惧非常严重，以至于会严重影响他们的日常生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Study-Fear-of-cancer-recurrence-is-common-among-adult-survivors-of-childhood-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Study-Fear-of-cancer-recurrence-is-common-among-adult-survivors-of-childhood-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9b7fc97-e699-4d11-a1c0-8ca33fadc6ca Tue, 15 Oct 2024 21:45:00 -0400 Study: Fear of cancer recurrence is common among adult survivors of childhood cancer
